mapper.select: SELECT memPw FROM member WHERE memId=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (memId, memPw, memName, memEmail, memHp, memZipcode, memAddress1, memAddress2, memNickname, memRoot) VALUES (#{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memName}, #{memEmail}, #{memHp}, #{memZipcode}, #{memAddress1}, #{memAddress2}, #{memNickname}, #{memRoot})
mapper.select: SELECT memId FROM member where memId = #{memId}
mapper.update: update member set memName=#{memName}, memNickname=#{memNickname}, memHp=#{memHp}, memZipcode=#{memZipcode}, memAddress1=#{memAddress1}, memAddress2=#{memAddress2} where memId = #{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT el.elNo, el.routineCreateDate, el.routineNo, dinfo.routineName FROM exerciselist el INNER JOIN detailinfo dinfo ON el.routineNo = dinfo.routineNo WHERE memId = #{memId}
SELECT sl.spNo, sl.spmCreateDate, sl.spmName, spms.spmName FROM spmlist sl INNER JOIN supplements spms ON sl.spmName = spms.spmName WHERE memId = #{memId}
